Hi, I'm  Gianluigi  — a  <  Frontend Developer  />  crafting intuitive, user-centered experiences.

With a foundation in design and expertise in modern front-end technologies, I build user-friendly interfaces that are both visually striking and highly functional.

With 4+ years of experience in designing and developing websites , web applications and mobile apps, I've built intuitive and scalable solutions for thousands of users across the ed-tech and healthcare industries.

I specialize in HTML5, CSS3 , JavaScript and frameworks like React and Angular . My design background gives me a sharp eye for detail, while my passion for full-stack development allows me to create robust web applications using JAMstack, serverless architectures, and headless CMS solution

Usually, Docker powers my development environment, spinning up services to test, deploy, and manage applications efficiently.

Recently, I've expanded into mobile development as well, using Ionic while also exploring Kotlin and Swift for native and portable experiences.
